title: Prohoe Rogue 55HXH Hoe and Axe Combination 40" Hickory Handle for Clearing and Trail Building | Toughest Tool | Pulaski Style
features: This Hoe/Axe Combo has a 5.5″ wide hoe end with a 4″ wide axe side and an overall head height of 14″.
It is excellent for trail building and fire line use
It is available with our 1-1/2″ diameter heavy-duty, shaped handle ilengths, or our 40″ curved Hickory
The head is made from the hardened steel of reclaimed agricultural disc blades and is glued and riveted to the handle for added stability.
